name: Martial
description: Your start with 1 Focus Point and your FP increases as shown in the Bastard Class Table. You also known Manuevers as shown in the table.

name: Melee Weapon Proficiency
description: You are Proficieny with all Melee weapons.

name: Military Shooter
description: You are Proficieny with Crossbows and Muskets.

name: Soldier's Focus
description: You regain half of your FP when you perform 1 or more Maneuvers as part of an Action, provided you do not spend SP as part of that Action.

name: Fighting Style
description: Choose 1 Weapon. Add +1 to any Attack you make using that type of weapon.

name: Second Wind
description: Once per Long Rest, you can spend 1 AP to regain a number of HP equal to your Proficiency

name: Adaptive Tactics
description: When you roll for Initiative, and at the end of each of your turns, you gain a d8 Tactical Die if you don't already have one. You can spend a Tactical Die to gain one of the following Tactics:\\n- Assault: When you make an Attack, you can add the die to the Attack's result.\\n- Deflect: When you are Attacked, you can subtract the die from the Attack's result.

name: Additional Feat
description: You gain 1 Feat of your choice.

name: Martial Role
description: At level three you choose your subclass, known as your Martial Role.

name: Additional Feat
description: You gain 1 Feat of your choice

name: Second Attack
description: When you make Attacks in combat, you do not gain a stack of DIS until after your 2nd Attack that round.

name: Improved Fighting Style
description: Choose one of the following options:\\n- You add and additional +1 to the Attacks of the Weapon you chose for your Fighting Style.\\n- Choose an additional weapon, and add +1 to your Attacks with it.
